introduction: 三石仁和同伴们成功打倒了罗刹王英邪之后，岩手终于再次得到了和平。可是最近有一个未知力量把罗刹王给复活了。不来方乔变身为鉄神岩光，再次和这邪恶力量对抗，同时早池峰健二和其他同伴则被困入异世界里。 唯有姬身结成功逃出魔爪，带着乔托付给他的血之御手符，将御手符交托给日高见新田。“拜托！你是我们最后的希望！”现在，新田在仍然迷迷糊糊地状况之下，变身为铁神岩光NEO，并且开始了与恶人对战的道路之上。Since after the King Rasha , Hideja had been defeated by Mitsuishi Jin and his friends, Iwate regained the long lost peace. However, this great evil has been resurrected by some kind of force recenty. Kosukata Joe transformed into Ganriser and fights for it, meanwhile Hayachine Kenji and the rest are trapped in another world. Only Himekami Yui manages to escape from this, with the special blood amulet which entrusted from Joe, she passes the amulet to Hitakami Arata.“Please! You’re our only hope!”And now, Arata transforms into Ganriser NEO and starts his journey in battling with the evil while in puzzled.
